name: TorrentMedia
alpha: Coming soon. This is an alpha version, many features are not finished. Please check back in the next version.

delete.ask: Are you sure you want to remove this torrent?

reset.title: Reset settings
reset.ask: Are you sure you want to reset settings to default?

autofeeds.title: Autofeeds
autofeeds.empty_msg1: AutoFeeds allows you to configure the channels to automatically download torrents.
autofeeds.empty_msg2: To begin you must first install or create a channel.

channels.title: Channels
channels.warning_msg: All channels are external to the application, easily found on the Internet. Torrent Media has no control over its content, you may find fake content, viruses or copyrighted. Torrent Media can not control what you download from the channels, so it is not responsible for damage or perjuicos that they could cause.
channels.warning_btn: I understand the risks, and take full responsibility
